title: Tarea 1
contents:
Carga de base de datos


library(tidyverse)
library(sjmisc)
library(kableExtra)
library(dplyr)
vdem <- read_rds ("vdem_subset.rds")


Histograma


knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = T, message=F, warning=F, error=F, 
                      comment=NA, cache=T, R.options=list(width=220), 
                      fig.align='center', out.width='75%', fig.asp=.75)

ggplot(data    = vdem,
  mapping = aes(x = v2x_partipdem)) +
  geom_histogram(color = "#ffafcc", fill = "#ffafcc", alpha = 1.0)


  labs(title = "Histograma de Índice de Participación en la Democracia.")

$title
[1] "Histograma de Índice de Participación en la Democracia."

attr(,"class")
[1] "labels"

Gráfico de barras


knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = T, message=F, warning=F, error=F, 
                      comment=NA, cache=T, R.options=list(width=220), 
                      fig.align='center', out.width='75%', fig.asp=.75)
vdem %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=as_factor(e_regionpol))) +
  
  geom_bar(color="#ffafcc",fill="#ffafcc",alpha=0.5)+
  scale_x_discrete(labels = function(x) str_wrap(x, width = 10))+
  labs(title = "Cantidad de países según región geográfica",
       x="Regiones geográficas", y="Frecuencia") +
  theme_minimal(base_family="Arial")



Boxplot


knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = T, message=F, warning=F, error=F, 
                      comment=NA, cache=T, R.options=list(width=220), 
                      fig.align='center', out.width='75%', fig.asp=.75)

vdem %>%
  ggplot(aes(x=as_factor(e_regionpol),v2x_partipdem)) +
  geom_boxplot(fill="#ffafcc",color="#ffafcc",alpha=0.5) +
  stat_summary(fun=mean,colour="black",geom="text",show.legend=FALSE,
               vjust=-0.5,family="Arial",
               aes(label=round(..y.., digits=1))) +
  scale_x_discrete(labels=function(x)str_wrap(x,width=10)) +
    labs(title="Boxplot: Índice de participación democrática por región.",
       subtitle = "¿Hasta qué medida se alcanza el ideal de democracia participativa?.", 
       x ="Región",y="Índice de participación democrática") +
  theme_minimal(base_family="Arial")



Scatterplot


knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = T, message=F, warning=F, error=F, 
                      comment=NA, cache=T, R.options=list(width=220), 
                      fig.align='center', out.width='75%', fig.asp=.75)

ggplot (vdem, aes(x= v2x_partipdem, y= e_peedgini)) + 
  geom_point()+
  geom_smooth(method=lm)

title: Tarea 2
contents:
Hipótesis:
# VI: e_peedgini, Question: How unequal is the level of education achieved by the population aged 15 years and older? VD: v2x_partipdem, Question: To what extent is the ideal of participatory democracy achieved?
Modelo simple:


Call:
lm(formula = v2x_partipdem ~ 1 + e_peedgini, data = vdem, na.action = na.exclude)

Residuals:
     Min       1Q   Median       3Q      Max 
-0.23334 -0.05493 -0.01400  0.05945  0.29435 

Coefficients:
              Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    
(Intercept)  0.3316984  0.0194986  17.011  < 2e-16 ***
e_peedgini  -0.0032262  0.0003623  -8.904 3.51e-15 ***
---
Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

Residual standard error: 0.1004 on 133 degrees of freedom
  (67 observations deleted due to missingness)
Multiple R-squared:  0.3735,    Adjusted R-squared:  0.3688 
F-statistic: 79.28 on 1 and 133 DF,  p-value: 3.506e-15


Modelo lineal multiple:


===================================================
                             Modelo 1    Modelo 2  
---------------------------------------------------
Participación en Democracia    0.33 ***    0.14 ***
                              (0.02)      (0.03)   
Gini educación                -0.00 ***   -0.00 ** 
                              (0.00)      (0.00)   
GDP per cápita                             0.02 ***
                                          (0.00)   
---------------------------------------------------
R^2                            0.37        0.58    
Adj. R^2                       0.37        0.58    
Num. obs.                    135         135       
===================================================
*** p < 0.001; ** p < 0.01; * p < 0.05

Evaluación de supuestos:
